metadata.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_StandingFlamingFist_000

0.speaker: Flaming Fist
0.text: Safe return to the city. We'll see you there, Helm willing.
